about_us.title: About us
about_us.description: We are a technology company that develops solutions for the insurance market.
about_us.text: We are a group of engineering students from the University of Minho based in the city of Guimarães (Azurém Campus) with a passion for motorsport. As the latest addition to the Formula Student scene in Portugal, we aim to deliver a project with a solid foundation and, in the short term, become a reference in the north of the country.

fs.title: Formula Student
fs.description: Formula Student is an international engineering competition that challenges university students to design, manufacture and compete with a racing car. The competition covers rigorous static and dynamic tests. Static tests include the team's business plan presentation, car production cost analysis and technical design evaluation. Dynamic tests assess the car's performance on the track, covering challenges such as skidpad, acceleration, autocross, endurance and efficiency. The scores obtained in these tests contribute to the calculation of the teams' overall score, thus determining the winners of each category.

classes.title: Formula Student Classes
classes.description: In Formula Student competitions there are three different classes

team.title: Team
team.description: The team is currently composed of 6 sectors, each dedicated to a specific area of the car. Each sector is composed of a head and several members, who work together to develop the best possible car. The team is led by a Team Leader, who coordinates the work of all sectors. There are also two technical directors, each overseeing the sectors of the car's electrical and mechanical parts.
team.management: The management sector handles the business side of the team. It is its responsibility to gather funds for the project via partnerships and also for its marketing. Management also has to fulfil the needs of the other departments. This includes ordering parts and tools or provide trainning sessions.
team.powertrain: The powertrain sector is responsible for the development of the power unit. It's the sector's duty to deliver a reliable and powerful electric motor. Efficiency is also key in this sector. The power unit needs to be tuned in such a way that it is always consuming the right amount of energy.
team.esw: As the name suggests, the electronics & software sector handles all the electronic components and software that keep the car safe and running smoothly. The sector makes sure all the major components of the car are properly programmed and communicating between each other.
team.drivetrain: The drivetrain sector focuses on delivering power from the engine to the wheels. It aims to achieve the most efficient power transfer in order to secure maximum acceleration and maintain speed for the full race distance.
team.chassiaero: The chassis and aerodynamics sector is responsible for designing and constructing the car's chassis. The chassis is the structure that supports all the car's components. Aerodynamics is responsible for minimizing air resistance and maximizing downforce.
team.suspension: The suspension & steering sector is essential for the car's performance. The suspension provides grip, stability, and absorbs track irregularities, while the steering allows the driver to control the car with precision.

invest.title: Invest in FSUMinho
invest.why-text: We are more than a group of students with a passion for motorsport. FSUMinho represents the first step in the formation of top engineers. Our members will enter the job market with experience and skills that will make them stand out. We want to offer students the chance of being part of a group that values everyone's work and pushes all members to show their full potential. Investing in our project means investing in the next generation of engineers and making sure that they gather as much experience as possible so that some day in the future they make a difference and push technology foward.
invest.monetary-text: Motorsport isn't cheap at all. Expenses start accumulating in the development of the car and can reach a great ammount when we start competing. Supporting our project finacially helps us manage all the expences all reach our goals.
invest.material-text: In order to build the car that we are designing, we'll need to gather various materials. Supplying materials to the team helps us take the car from the modeling software to the race track.
invest.knowledge-text: Even though we consider ourselves very skilled and talented, knowledge is never enough. We are always open to learn from actual professionals from our areas of expertise.
invest.diamond-text: Diamond sponsors will receive the highest level of visibility on the bodywork and in our merchandising. Additionally, they will have the opportunity to collaborate with the team on an annual project. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.diamond-value: Diamond sponsorship requires an investment of 10000€ or more
invest.gold-text: Gold sponsors will have voting power in decision-making sessions. Their logo presence will be bigger compared to silver sponsors. The team will mention their company in press articles or scientific magazines. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.gold-value: Gold sponsorship requires an investment between 5000€ and 10000€
invest.silver-text: Silver sponsors will have VIP status in events organized by FSUMinho. Their logo will also be present on the car and merchandising, but will have more presence than bronze logos. This tier will receive a monthly report containing everything done by the team. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.silver-value: Silver sponsorship requires an investment between 2500€ and 5000€
invest.bronze-text: Bronze sponsors will have a spot in our sponsor portfolio. They will have their logo present in the car in more visible parts of the bodywork and merchandising items. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.bronze-value: Bronze sponsorship requires an investment between 1000€ and 2500€
invest.partner-text: Partners will benefit from divulgation of their brands via social media campaigns and their logos will be present in our car.
invest.partner-value: Partner status requires an investment up to 1000€ or other type of collaboration with the team.
